subject: California Chrome (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)

Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Nearly four decades ago, Richard Migliore saw back-to-back Triple Crowns as a teenage exercise rider. He and many other fans are hoping to feel that magic again at Belmont Park on Saturday.
snippet: Nearly four decades ago, Richard Migliore saw back-to-back Triple Crowns as a teenage exercise rider. He and many other fans are hoping to feel that magic again at Belmont Park on Saturday.
